{{also|kind|-kind}} ==German== {{wikipedia|lang=de}} ===Alternative forms=== * {{l|de|Kindt}} {{qualifier|obsolete}} ===Etymology=== {{PIE root|de|ǵenh₁}} From {{inh|de|gmh|kint}}, from {{inh|de|goh|kind}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*kindą}}, {{m|gem-pro|*kinþą}}, from {{der|de|ine-pro|*ǵenh₁-||to give birth}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/kɪnt/}} * {{audio|de|De-Kind.ogg|audio}} * {{rhymes|de|ɪnt}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|n|Kindes|gen2=Kinds|Kinder|Kindchen|dim2=Kindlein|dim3=Kindelein}} # [[kid]]; [[child]] {{gloss|young person}} # child; [[offspring]] {{gloss|person with regard to his or her parents; also a baby animal or young animal, especially as the second component in numerous compound nouns}} #: {{ux|de|Er war das zweitgeborene '''Kind''' in der Familie.|He was the second-born '''child''' in the family.}} #: {{ux|de|Er ist das '''Kind''' zweier blinder Eltern.|He is the '''child''' of two blind parents.}} ====Usage notes==== * The normal plural is '''''Kinder'''''. The double plural {{m|de|Kinders}} (also {{m|de|Kinners}}) is colloquial and chiefly restricted to Low German areas (northern Germany). It is most often heard as a [[vocative]], either referring to an actual group of children or figuratively: ''Kinders, wie die Zeit vergeht!'' − “Boy, how time flies!” * In German law ''Kind'' is usually defined as a person under 14 years of age,''Gesetz über die Verbreitung jugendgefährdender Schriften und Medieninhalte'' (GjS or GjSM) from 1985 (with changes from 1994 and 1997), §.1(4); ''Jugendschutzgesetz'' (JuSchG) from 2002 (with changes from 2013), §.1(1) while in non-German law ''Kind'' can mean ''a person under 18 years of age''.''Übereinkommen über die Rechte des Kindes'' (VN-Kinderrechtskonvention or UN-Kinderrechtskonvention), Art.1 See also {{m|de|Jugendlicher}} (person under 18 years but at least 14 years old) and {{m|de|Minderjähriger}} (person under 18 years of age). ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-n|(e)s|er}} ====Hyponyms==== * {{sense|young person}} {{l|de|Kleinkind}} ====Derived terms==== {{der3|de |Adamskind |Adlerkind |Affenkind |Bärenkind gehn in die Schul.|The '''kids''' go to the school.}} #: {{ux|hrx|Sie baad eere '''Kind'''.|She bathes her '''child'''.}} ===Further reading=== *
